perm.name: About Me
perm.decription: Provides access to the "About Me" section of the profile in the about property

perm.name: user activities
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's list of activities as the activities connection

perm.name: user birthday
perm.decription: Provides access to the birthday with year as the birthday property

perm.name: user checkins
perm.decription: Provides read access to the authorized user's check-ins or a friend's check-ins that the user can see.

perm.name: user_education_history
perm.decription: Provides access to education history as the education property

perm.name: user_events
perm.decription: Provides access to the list of events the user is attending as the events connection

perm.name: user groups
perm.decription: Provides access to the list of groups the user is a member of as the groups connection

perm.name: user hometown
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's hometown in the hometown property

perm.name: user interests
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's list of interests as the interests connection

perm.name: user likes
perm.decription: Provides access to the list of all of the pages the user has liked as the likes connection

perm.name: user location
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's current location as the location property

perm.name: user notes
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's notes as the notes connection

perm.name: user interests
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's list of interests as the interests connection

perm.name: user online presence
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's online/offline presence

perm.name: user photos
perm.decription: Provides access to the photos the user has uploaded, and photos the user has been tagged in

perm.name: user questions
perm.decription: Provides access to the questions the user or friend has asked

perm.name: user relationships
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's family and personal relationships and relationship status

perm.name: user relationships
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's family and personal relationships and relationship status

perm.name: user relationship details
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's relationship preferences

perm.name: user religion politics
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's religious and political affiliations

perm.name: user status
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's most recent status message

perm.name: user videos
perm.decription: Provides access to the videos the user has uploaded, and videos the user has been tagged in

perm.name: user website
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's web site URL

perm.name: user work history
perm.decription: Provides access to work history as the work property

perm.name: email
perm.decription: Provides access to the user's primary email address in the email property. Do not spam users. Your use of email must comply both with Facebook policies and with the CAN-SPAM Act.

perm.name: About Me
perm.decription: Provides access to the "About Me" section of the profile in the about property

perm.name: friends activities
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's list of activities as the activities connection

perm.name: friends birthday
perm.decription: Provides access to the birthday with year as the birthday property

perm.name: friends checkins
perm.decription: Provides read access to the authorized friends's check-ins or a friend's check-ins that the friends can see.

perm.name: friends_education_history
perm.decription: Provides access to education history as the education property

perm.name: friends_events
perm.decription: Provides access to the list of events the friends is attending as the events connection

perm.name: friends groups
perm.decription: Provides access to the list of groups the friends is a member of as the groups connection

perm.name: friends hometown
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's hometown in the hometown property

perm.name: friends interests
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's list of interests as the interests connection

perm.name: friends likes
perm.decription: Provides access to the list of all of the pages the friends has liked as the likes connection

perm.name: friends location
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's current location as the location property

perm.name: friends notes
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's notes as the notes connection

perm.name: friends interests
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's list of interests as the interests connection

perm.name: friends online presence
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's online/offline presence

perm.name: friends photos
perm.decription: Provides access to the photos the friends has uploaded, and photos the friends has been tagged in

perm.name: friends questions
perm.decription: Provides access to the questions the friends or friend has asked

perm.name: friends relationships
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's family and personal relationships and relationship status

perm.name: friends relationships
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's family and personal relationships and relationship status

perm.name: friends relationship details
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's relationship preferences

perm.name: friends religion politics
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's religious and political affiliations

perm.name: friends status
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's most recent status message

perm.name: friends videos
perm.decription: Provides access to the videos the friends has uploaded, and videos the friends has been tagged in

perm.name: friends website
perm.decription: Provides access to the friends's web site URL

perm.name: friends work history
perm.decription: Provides access to work history as the work property

perm.name: read friendlists
perm.decription: Provides access to any friend lists the user created. All user's friends are provided as part of basic data, this extended permission grants access to the lists of friends a user has created, and should only be requested if your application utilizes lists of friends.

perm.name: read insights
perm.decription: Provides read access to the Insights data for pages, applications, and domains the user owns.

perm.name: read mailbox
perm.decription: Provides the ability to read from a user's Facebook Inbox.

perm.name: read requests
perm.decription: Provides read access to the user's friend requests

perm.name: read stream
perm.decription: Provides access to all the posts in the user's News Feed and enables your application to perform searches against the user's News Feed

perm.name: xmpp_login
perm.decription: Provides applications that integrate with Facebook Chat the ability to log in users.

perm.name: ads management
perm.decription: Provides the ability to manage ads and call the Facebook Ads API on behalf of a user.

perm.name: create event
perm.decription: Enables your application to create and modify events on the user's behalf

perm.name: manage friendlists
perm.decription: Enables your app to create and edit the user's friend lists.

perm.name: manage notifications
perm.decription: Enables your app to read notifications and mark them as read. This permission will be required to all access to notifications after October 22, 2011.

perm.name: offline access
perm.decription: Enables your app to perform authorized requests on behalf of the user at any time. By default, most access tokens expire after a short time period to ensure applications only make requests on behalf of the user when the are actively using the application. This permission makes the access token returned by our OAuth endpoint long-lived.

perm.name: publish checkins
perm.decription: Enables your app to perform checkins on behalf of the user.

perm.name: publish stream
perm.decription: Enables your app to post content, comments, and likes to a user's stream and to the streams of the user's friends. With this permission, you can publish content to a user's feed at any time, without requiring offline_access. However, please note that Facebook recommends a user-initiated sharing model.

perm.name: rsvp event
perm.decription: Enables your application to RSVP to events on the user's behalf

perm.name: sms
perm.decription: Enables your application to send messages to the user and respond to messages from the user via text message

perm.name: publish actions
perm.decription: Enables your application to publish user scores and achievements.

perm.name: manage pages
perm.decription: Enables your application to retrieve access_tokens for pages the user administrates. The access tokens can be queried using the "accounts" connection in the Graph API. This permission is only compatible with the Graph API.
